comment: I had her for an honors immigration class. Her class is like any English class with 5 papers and 1 ppt presentation. She is a tough grader. Overall the class was interesting, but kinda boring with ppt lectures and notes every class. ATTENDANCE IS MANDATORY!!!! :(

I have Dr. Morrissey for Honors Seminar, so I can't comment on what she's like in her normal English classes. What I can say though is that she seems to be a nice lady who doesn't speak very loudly and is not known for her sense of humor. She is in fact quite boring, but then again, there's not much room for entertainment in a class like this.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She's very sweet and is not confrontational at all. I'm in KSU honors seminar and we have a fair amount of work, but she grades lightly and will help you if you need it. I would take her again. She's monotone and can be boring but overall a good class. Pretty enlightening too.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She's so sweet, but boring as a brick. The most time consuming thing about the class is all the reading she requires. But the grades are easy and the assignments are clear. It's an easy A. The hardest part of her class is trying not to sleep through it
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: she is so sweet and really wants everyone to do well, but its so much reading and so many assignments. the discussions were kind of boring at times but fun if you engaged. the books were generally very interesting but the amount of work that went with them made them hard to enjoy.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: SO MUCH HW. this class took up so much of my time and it'S a gen ed. i could have gotten all the work for my other 5 classes done in the amount of time i spent on this class alone. there is at least 1 assignment due on a reading every class, sometimes 2. the work load is unnecessary and honestly annoying. the books are interesting but thats it
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She's a great lady, super sweet, but I've never been more bored in a class ever. Yikes. Isn't a crazy tough grader but the final was extremely hard.

Dr. Morrissey is a fantastic professor. A lot of the stories are interesting. 15 reading Logs and 5 essays (Depending, she may let you revise your paper for a better grade). Definitely helpful; If you email her about your paper, she'll give you an immediate response.

By far my favorite class at KSU! The readings are very interesting, and the discussions are just the same. Professor Morrisey is very open to interpretations other than her own. The creative project is fun, and the midterm/final are short answer and based off the readings. The class is very interesting and easy if you participate.

Wonderful professor; you can tell she loves her subject and wants students to love it too. It's an easy class if you participate in discussions, write good interpretation papers, and study. The midterm is super easy, and she's very fair. She respects everyone's opinions and interpretations of what we read and always has interesting info to add.

Professor Morrisey is such a great teacher! She really cares about her students and what goes on in the classroom. While she was not the easiest teacher, she is in no way unfair. Just do your work and you will be fine in here.

Honors section. Great professor & class. If you do all of the work and come to class, you will get an A. It's not a hard class, but it's also not boring - very engaging discussions. The only grades are interpretation papers (not formal papers), a creative project, midterm, and final. Only thing is, she is a bit opinionated so side with her.
She is SO nice. If you do your work, you will get an A. I took her for Honors English, and she always gave suggestions for your rough draft to make it an A paper.
I took her for an honors special topics course on Immigrant lit but I also had her last year for honors world lit.  Definitely do the reading and write intelligent papers and you will do well.
Online Ethical Leadership Course- BEST COURSE EVER!! NICEST PROFESSOR EVER!! Course content is valuable for everyone- highly recommended!! This course changed my life...not joking
Took her class online, one of the nicest professors I've had. Weekly discussion and journals. Movie response papers and two major tests. Extremely helpful and open to opinions.

One of the best professor in the University. Teaches the class perfectly. I am so glad I had her for my english lit. class. I learned so much about life itself. If you can take her class, you would be a lucky student. Just do your work on time and study.  The class is very interesting.
She is a really great professor. Really nice and she knows her material. I would take her again, if I needed another English class
Very helpful but seems to lack the ability to control the class.

Took her for the honors section of World Literature. It was a really fun class, and the discussions were great. The reflection papers were easy, because they were just based on your interpretation of the work. It was A LOT of reading, but the works were interesting. I'd take her again if I needed another English class! Highly recommend!

This class was really great.  Had some really awesome discussions.  The reflection papers were not too hard and actually helped my understanding of the works we read. The creative project was my favorite because you can do pretty much anything based on a work read during the semester.  Tests are challenging but not impossible.

Brilliant teacher! I wasn't too much into world literature before the class, but if you just attend the classes, take notes and do your readings you'll do well. Very nice and helpful teacher with positive approach.
She is kind of easy. Just listen to everything she said in class, take notes and do your homework >>> you gonna be fine. Class is a little bit boring and sometimes you may fall asleep. lol
I was very interested in learning in her class at the start.  Through all of the trouble i have had in understanding what she wanted i now just want to pass.

OMG this lady will not listen to you! She is so stubborn and stutters a lot and is really boring. It's always her way no matter what! If I knew she would be like this, I would have dropped this class. She gives you so much busy work and treats you like a middle-schooler!
she is so tough when she is grading papers. no tolerance or something like that. I dont recommend her to anybody.

There was too much work in this class especially since its just the seminar class.Alot of the work was worth like 5% but took much time and work to complete it.There was one test and one final but there was alot of other work. She's a sweet lady but some of the work is unnecessary.Attendence is a big part of your grade,she mite mark you abesent if
She is such a sweet lady. Slightly socially awkward, but nonetheless determined to help you succeed. I really enjoyed Eng 1101 with her, but don't expect class to be riveting.
I took her class at my first semester at KSU. She is absolutly brilliant. She is very easy-going and helpful professor. Definetly take her class, you will never regret.
VERY easy teacher, take her for your first english class in college, you'll pass for sure.
SHE IS VERY HELPFUL AND VERY NICE.  SHE GRADES VERY EASY. TAKE HER IF YOU ARE GOING TO TAKE ENG 0099 OR OTHER ENGLISH.
